Class SolidTerrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
      • game.SolidTerrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fence, HorizontalWall, VerticalWall

    public abstract class SolidTerrain
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
    An abstract class that represents Ground instances that cannot be passed by Actors.
    Author:
    Daniel Yuen

      Override this to implement terrain that blocks thrown objects but not movement, or vice versa
      boolean canActorEnter(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
      Override this to implement impassable terrain, or terrain that is only passable if conditions are met.

      Returns true is the ripeAge of the Crop is 0.
